{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | num=1 | since=fs_ts | 1=
bool is_absolute() const;
}}
{{dcl | num=2 | since=fs_ts | 1=
bool is_relative() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Checks whether the path is absolute or relative. An absolute path is such that the elements of {{c|root_path()}} uniquely identify a file system location. The first version returns {{c|true}} if the path is absolute, {{c|false}} otherwise; the second version the other way round.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|true}} if the path is absolute, {{c|false}} otherwise.

@2@ {{c|false}} if the path is absolute, {{c|true}} otherwise.
